name: Habrahabr Darkness
description: The style will develop and update. If something breaks, please give me to know by twitter or telegram: @valsaven Feel free to send your PR here: https://github.com/valsaven/userstyles Big thanks to: TotalCaesar659, inoyakaigor ⚠️ For the old site version (https://habr.com/berserk-mode-nope) use this style https://userstyles.org/styles/210670/habrahabr-darkness-old-site
